alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 3:26AM MST until November 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with the highest amounts over and near the higher terrain. * WHERE...Teller County and the Rampart Range and El Paso County. * WHEN...From 8 PM Thursday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
